name: agent-runtime
description:
This is the repository behind a security-constrained agent runtime, which aims to build a security-constrained agent runtime that deterministically mediates between an LLM and real tools.
The runtime will accomplish this in 2 ways: 1. Enforcing explicit policies 2. Enabling systematic verification.
author: Evan Berendt, Dorian Bell Jr., Kevin Rivera, Ting-Chia Liu
